title: crispy salmon
directions: 1. Pour a little oil in a pan
2. Add the peeled & par boiled potatoes and heat them up
3. Remove and crush gently with a fork to absorb the olive oil
4. Chop and add the spring onions
7. Drizzle with a basic vinaigrette (mix the vinaigrette ingredients together)
1. Roll the fish up and score/slice into the meat through the skin
2. Season with salt & pepper and stuff with fresh thyme or basil
3. Heat the oil and when it begins to smoke, add the salmon

ingredients: New Potatoes	8 par boiled and peeled
